titles.title: North American Energy Infrastructure Act

A bill to establish a more uniform, transparent, and modern process to authorize the construction, connection, operation, and maintenance of international border-crossing facilities for the import and export of oil and natural gas and the transmission of electricity.
North American Energy Infrastructure Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
North American Energy Infrastructure Act
This bill prohibits any person from constructing, connecting, operating, or maintaining a border-crossing facility for the import or export of oil, natural gas, or electricity across an international border of the United States without obtaining a certificate of crossing, subject to specified exclusions.
